## 1. 
```{r, echo=TRUE}
path <- "states.csv"
states <- read.csv(path)
```
```{r echo = TRUE}
income <- states[[3]]
income
length <- length(income)
length
class(income)
colnames(states[3])
```

## 3. boxplots
```{r base R boxplot, echo = TRUE}
boxplot(income, 
        horizontal = TRUE, 
        xlab = "US states Income in 1974")
median(income)
quantile(income, probs = c(.25, .5, .75))
## so we have IQR = .75 - .25
IQR <- 4813.50 - 3992.75
IQR
```
